thumb.title: Bitter Sweet World（feat.Synthesizer V 京町セイカAI）／ライカドッグ・インフィニティ〈Laikadog Infinity〉
thumb.description: It's dark here. The city is silent at night.It's like an interlude to the next world.With my eyes closed,I tried to search for your footprints. But what did I lose that day?You,standing in the wind,are telling me something.Before I knew it,your words had vanished into the darkness. You always said,"You can't see the truth."But I don't believe in things I can't see.I've been lost,searching for answers.I rewind the tape that day,that time.Your heartbeat is still ringing inside me.With those scars engraved in my mind,you said,"Goodbye."You,standing in the wind,are telling me something.Before I knew it,your words had vanished into the darkness.
